column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We tried this restaurant  for my birthday
column3: i was so hungry coming in straight from work
column4: but the waiter would not let us put an appetizer in without the entire order.  he said it works best for the kitchen
column5: i dont think thats my problem
column6: and i hurried on a dinner decision just to get an appetizer
column7: over all the food was just ok.  the music was loud and  strange
column8: wont go back... better places out there for special occasions.
